revised_title: On the Electric Origin of Terrestrial Magnetism and the Influence of Electric Currents on Magnetic Needles
tldr: The author investigates the electric origin of terrestrial magnetism and the influence of electric currents on magnetic needles. The study reveals that the laws of terrestrial magnetism are inconsistent with those of a permanent magnetic body and are in accordance with a body in a transient state of magnetic induction. The findings support the idea that electric currents induce magnetism in the Earth.
